title: Revenue of the New England Patriots ( NFL ) 2001 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 575.0 was reached at Year 2016
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 191.0 was reached at Year 2003
